All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ball
The main pong ball for pong Moves in the vertical and horizontal direction and can reflect its velocity upon collision
Ball.Owner
 
Button
A class to represent a selectable button within the game environment allowing for the triggering of specific actions or events when selected by the player.
ButtonManager
The ButtonManager class manages the buttons and controls within the Pong game environment.
Menu
The Menu class represents a menu within the Pong game environment.
Paddle
The Paddle class represents a paddle within the Pong game environment.
Particle
The Particle class represents a particle within the game environment.
ParticleGenerator
The ParticleGenerator class represents a particle generator within the game environment.
Pong
The main class for the pong mini-game Contains a single ball and two paddles controlled by the 'z', 'x', 'n', and 'm' keys
PowerUp
The PowerUp class represents a power-up within the game environment.
Trail
